bibl.title: Letter from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Lazear, June 1, 1875

div1.p: Lazear writes about killing potato bugs, attending church, studying the map of Europe, and memorization.

div1.head: Letter from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Lazear, June 1, 1875
div1.p:
I know
you will be glad to hear
from me. I made ten cents
for killing potato bugs. I
scalded them last Saturda
y I went to Church Sunday
I am on the may [map] of Europe
it is very difficult. I know
my piece for the Distribution.
I hope I will speake it well,
My piece is What does it matter
It is very pretty

All the boys are going to
speak. I hope I will get a
premium. Give my love to all
